sections.heading: Referral to membership10-2015.Referral to membershipUpon demand of one half of the entire board of directors any matter that has been approved or passed by the board shall be referred to the membership or the shareholders for decision at the next special or regular meeting
sections.text: Referral to membership10-2015.Referral to membershipUpon demand of one half of the entire board of directors any matter that has been approved or passed by the board shall be referred to the membership or the shareholders for decision at the next special or regular meeting.
